e0b18d25-0d48-4375-8a1b-d3453a1061da.name: WeatherDisplayCard
e0b18d25-0d48-4375-8a1b-d3453a1061da.description: A card component to display various weather-related information.

supported_props.name: label
supported_props.description: Label for the weather data (e.g., Current Temperature, Feels Like).

supported_props.name: value
supported_props.description: The actual weather value to display.

supported_props.name: unit
supported_props.description: Unit of the weather value (e.g., °C, °F).

supported_props.name: description
supported_props.description: Textual description of the weather conditions (e.g., Sunny, Partly Cloudy).

supported_props.name: icon
supported_props.description: Name of the icon representing the weather condition.

supported_props.name: onClick
supported_props.description: Callback function when the card is clicked.

4b57b921-2360-4479-8e4d-7734bba9d8e6.description: An icon button used to initiate a search.

supported_props.name: icon
supported_props.description: Name of the icon to display.

supported_props.name: onClick
supported_props.description: Callback function when the button is clicked.

supported_props.name: ariaLabel
supported_props.description: Accessibility label for the button.

supported_props.description: Callback function when an item is selected.

supported_props.name: itemKey

supported_props.description: Accessibility label for the list.

supported_props.name: isReorderable
supported_props.description: If true, items in the list can be reordered.

supported_props.name: onReorder
supported_props.description: Callback function when items are reordered. Provides the new order of items.
